oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Economic Value of Early Cytogenetic Testing of Potential Cattle Breeding Stock
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Weber, Alvin F.
Buoen, Lance
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: genetic pool
cytogenetic
testing
certification requests
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In light of continued shrinkage of the cattle genetic pool and an increase in pre-sale cytogenetic certification requests, it is important for those engaged in the cattle industry to be aware of the need for selective early cytogenetic testing.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2001; 209
